We are at the point where words fail to express how devastating it is to get fire news from all over the country. We hope this disaster ends as soon as possible.

#yangın

Wildfires don't just burn trees!

A burning forest means an ecosystem where biodiversity has been damaged. It is a disaster area

where many animals have died,
the vegetation is damaged,
climate change and drought are one step closer,

and risks such as floods and landslides increased.

We wish this disaster to end as soon as possible and hope to see the days when we regain our lush forests.

#yangın
